statements: SELECT * FROM demand_outliers;
SELECT product_name, demand_quantity FROM demand_outliers WHERE demand_quantity > 100;
SELECT id, product_name, demand_quantity FROM demand_outliers ORDER BY demand_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM demand_outliers WHERE outlier_reason LIKE '%discontinued%';
SELECT id, product_name FROM demand_outliers WHERE product_name = 'ProductA';
SELECT * FROM demand_outliers;
SELECT product_name, demand_quantity FROM demand_outliers WHERE demand_quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, outlier_reason FROM demand_outliers WHERE outlier_reason LIKE '%out of stock%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM demand_outliers WHERE product_name LIKE 'P%' OR outlier_reason IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, product_name, demand_quantity FROM demand_outliers WHERE demand_quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY product_name ASC, id DESC;
SELECT * FROM DemandOutliers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT date, demand FROM DemandOutliers WHERE demand > 100;
SELECT id, date, is_outlier FROM DemandOutliers WHERE is_outlier = true;
SELECT * FROM ForecastingAccuracy WHERE actual_demand < forecasted_demand;
SELECT id, date, actual_demand, forecasted_demand FROM ForecastingAccuracy WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, date, demand, is_outlier FROM DemandOutliers WHERE date >= '2021-01-01' AND demand > 100 ORDER BY date DESC, demand ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM DemandOutliers WHERE is_outlier = TRUE AND date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY demand DESC, date ASC;
SELECT id, actual_demand, forecasted_demand FROM ForecastingAccuracy WHERE forecasted_demand > actual_demand AND date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY forecasted_demand - actual_demand DESC, date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, date, actual_demand, forecasted_demand FROM ForecastingAccuracy WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY date DESC, forecasted_demand ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, date, actual_demand, forecasted_demand FROM ForecastingAccuracy WHERE actual_demand <> forecasted_demand ORDER BY date ASC, actual_demand DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM DemandOutliers;
SELECT timestamp, demand_value, outlier_reason FROM DemandOutliers ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, forecasted_value, actual_value FROM ForecastAccuracy WHERE forecasting_error > 0.2;
SELECT id, investigation_details FROM InvestigationResults WHERE outlier_id = 1;
SELECT id, timestamp, forecasted_value, actual_value FROM ForecastAccuracy JOIN InvestigationResults ON ForecastAccuracy.id = InvestigationResults.id;
SELECT * FROM DemandOutliers WHERE demand_value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, outlier_reason FROM DemandOutliers WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT outlier_id, investigation_details FROM InvestigationResults WHERE recommendation = 'Review Required';
SELECT timestamp, actual_value, forecasted_value, forecasting_error FROM ForecastAccuracy WHERE forecasting_error > 5 ORDER BY timestamp LIMIT 5;
SELECT d.id, d.timestamp, f.actual_value, f.forecasting_error FROM DemandOutliers d INNER JOIN ForecastAccuracy f ON d.timestamp = f.timestamp;
SELECT * FROM demand_outliers;
SELECT product_id, date, demand_value FROM demand_outliers WHERE demand_value > 100;
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT MAX(accuracy) AS max_accuracy, MIN(deviation) AS min_deviation FROM forecast_accuracy;
SELECT date, product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM sales_data GROUP BY date, product_id;
SELECT * FROM demand_outliers ORDER BY date DESC, demand_value DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT date, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM sales_data GROUP BY date HAVING total_quantity > 100 ORDER BY date;
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT date, AVG(accuracy) AS avg_accuracy FROM forecast_accuracy GROUP BY date HAVING avg_accuracy > 80 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Outliers;
SELECT id, demand FROM Forecasting WHERE forecast_value > 100;
SELECT id, demand FROM DemandHistory ORDER BY demand DESC;
SELECT date, forecast_value FROM Forecasting WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, reason FROM Investigation WHERE outlier_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Outliers WHERE demand > 100 ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT date, forecast_value FROM Forecasting WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY date DESC;

SELECT DemandHistory.date, SUM(demand) AS total_demand FROM DemandHistory JOIN Forecasting ON DemandHistory.date = Forecasting.date WHERE Forecasting.forecast_value > 500 GROUP BY DemandHistory.date ORDER BY total_demand DESC;

SELECT Investigation.id, Outliers.id AS outlier_id, Investigation.reason FROM Investigation JOIN Outliers ON Outliers.id = Investigation.outlier_id WHERE Outliers.demand > 200 ORDER BY Outliers.id ASC, Investigation.date DESC;
SELECT date, AVG(accuracy) AS avg_accuracy FROM ForecastingAccuracy WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' GROUP BY date HAVING AVG(accuracy) > 0.9 ORDER BY avg_accuracy DESC;
